about_the_game: Presenting the complete Soundtrack for Sunshine Manor, written, recorded and mastered by Fossil Games. This 23 track OST is a retro-fuelled love letter to artists such as John Carpenter, Tangerine Dream and many more. So whack on your headphones and stomp around in a suitably spooky manner to this synthwave inspired OST.
detailed_description: Presenting the complete Soundtrack for Sunshine Manor, written, recorded and mastered by Fossil Games. This 23 track OST is a retro-fuelled love letter to artists such as John Carpenter, Tangerine Dream and many more. So whack on your headphones and stomp around in a suitably spooky manner to this synthwave inspired OST.
name: Sunshine Manor Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 190 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 490 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please view all files in Steam to access your MP3s
